Title: MyWGP XmlDataValidator
Description: This is designed and developed (in Silverlight 2, C#) to validate the requirements of data in xml files: the type & size of data, and the requirement status.  It allows a user to choose the type of data, enter min & max size, and check the requirement status for data elements.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is designed and developed (in Silverlight 2, C#) to validate the requirements of data in xml files: the type & size of data, and the requirement status. It allows a user to choose the type of data, enter min & max size, and check the requirement status for data elements.
